column2: Health;Siem Reap:------   A foreigner was found dead at about 7:30 am on November 25 in Room 112 of the Vihara Hotel
column5: a 79 year old British national arrived in Cambodia on November 4
column7: at the Siem Reap International Airport as a tourist.------Police and a court doctor concluded that the man had died of chronic lung disease. ------The body is sent to Wat Teuk Thla
column9: to await the decision of the family and embassy.
